definition: to utter monotonously and repetitively and rhythmically, a repetitive song in which as many syllables as necessary are assigned to a single tone
details:
verb
- to utter monotonously and repetitively and rhythmically
= example: to utter monotonously and repetitively and rhythmically
= synonyms: tone
- to recite with musical intonation
= example: to recite with musical intonation
= synonyms: intone, intonate, cantillate
noun
- a repetitive song in which as many syllables as necessary are assigned to a single tone
